Stella

LEARN ALL ABOUT STELLA

DID SOMEONE SAY TESTING?

Stella is a testing tool. You define your testplans using a powerful Ruby DSL (domain specific language) and Stella takes care of the rest.

Solutious. There's no prohibition on performance. Copyright 2006-2009.
